titleStmt.title: The first part of youths errors. Written by Thomas Bushel, the superlatiue prodigall
titleStmt.author: Bushell, Thomas, 1594-1674.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The confession of a prodigall.
Pages 65-66 and 91-98 missing and 144-145 repeated in number only.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
